levels.description: Stops attacking; ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>; When hit by an enemy's normal attack, launches long-ranged spikes at up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies in front (<@ba.vup>{cooldown:0.0}</>-second cooldown)
